title: Virgin Galactic Goes All In on New Delta Spaceship
summary: After finally reaching a regular cadence of launches, Richard Branson’s Virgin Galactic will abandon the Unity spaceship after just two or three more flights as it shifts resources into the […]

title: ViaSat-3 failure investigation to conclude next week
summary: Viasat expects to know next week what caused the antenna deployment issue that severely impaired its debut ViaSat-3 broadband satellite over the Americas, the operator’s CEO announced during earnings results Nov. 8.

title: Virgin Galactic to halt Unity suborbital flights by mid-2024
summary: Virgin Galactic will reduce the frequency of flights of its current suborbital vehicle and stop them entirely by mid-2024 as it concentrates resources on the next generation of vehicles.

title: Virgin Galactic pausing flights next year and laying off 18% to focus on next-gen spacecraft
summary: Virgin Galactic plans to pause spaceflight operations next year to focus resources on developing its next-generation Delta-class spacecraft, the company announced Wednesday.

title: Rocket Lab pushes to get launch business back on track, with 22 Electron missions booked next year
summary: Rocket Lab is pushing to get its launch business back on track by the end of the year, reporting on Wednesday third-quarter results that saw continued strength in its space systems division.
